post:
Thank you for checking LoomHosts out, a Singapore-based VPS Services provider offering services in Dallas, Texas at this time. Currently, we are running the following 25% off for our OpenVZ SSD Services in Dallas, TX.

LoomHosts' VPS already includes the following features at the moment:

-24/7 Ticket Support

-99.9% Guarantee on Uptime with SLA coverage

-7 Day Money Back Guarantee

-Reliable Dallas Upstream via Limestone Networks, Inc. datacenter and network (AS46475) with transit via TeliaSonera, AboveNet, Savvis, Cogent, Internap

-FREE DNS [name hosting] Servers Upon Request

-FREE Incoming Bandwidth - Incoming Bandwidth is not Accounted!

-Reverse-DNS Setup in our Client Panel - No Need for Ticketing!

-IPv6-support!

-FREE SSL Certificates for services supported by GlobalSign OneClickSSL!

-Discounted Licensing on cPanel and WHMCS.

The new SSD VPS offerings are as follows (with a 15% initial offering discount with the code SSDLAUNCH):

Rocket VPS:

5GB Disk Space (SSD)

200GB Bandwidth

256MB RAM

1 IP Address - 1 CPU Core

$4.25/month

Order Here

Windy VPS

10GB Disk Space (SSD)

400GB Bandwidth

512MB RAM

1 IP Address - 1 CPU Core

$8.49/month

Order Here

ThunderBolt VPS

20GB Disk Space (SSD)

600GB Bandwidth

1024MB RAM

1 IP Address - 2 CPU Cores

$16.99/month

Order Here

To view more plans, or to order a custom plan, simply visit http://www.loomhosts.com/virtual-private-server-hosting/openvz/#ssd-vps .
